2024-1183.label: Amending Regulation
2024-1183.comment: Amending regulation contains 'patch' instructions, not standalone law. Use consolidated 910/2014 for RAG and terminology.

2014-910.label: Consolidated Regulation
2014-910.comment: Primary source of truth for current eIDAS law.

2016-679.label: GDPR
2016-679.comment: General Data Protection Regulation - foundational data protection law. Article 4 contains 26 key definitions for personal data processing.

2008-765.label: Referenced Regulation
2008-765.comment: Foundational regulation defining conformity assessment, accreditation, and market surveillance frameworks. Referenced by eIDAS 910/2014.

2019-881.label: Cybersecurity Act
2019-881.comment: ENISA and ICT cybersecurity certification framework. Article 2 contains 22 definitions. Referenced by eIDAS wallet certification requirements.

2022-2555.label: NIS2 Directive
2022-2555.comment: Network and Information Security Directive. Article 6 contains 38 definitions for cybersecurity entities and services. Referenced by eIDAS for incident response and security requirements.
